name: Fire vs Ice (Nes Box Jam 2015)
description:
UPDATE 12/01/2015: the game is a little less dark and the timer ends at the death of the boss and not 2s later... è__é

This game was made for Nes Box Art Jam in November 2015, hosted by bartekci & cdutson: http://itch.io/jam/nes-box-art-jam

I made all the game with Construct 2 and I've got to thank Paradox for his cool particle demo that he shared:

https://www.scirra.com/tutorials/761/particle-demo...

His profile: https://www.scirra.com/users/paradox

Thanks for playing!

PS: Better in fullscreen and with headphones. First loading may be pretty long.

PPS: There's a little glitch hidden (that I purposely let.. *kof kof). If you like big pixels!
